message: Mink stands there, blocking my path.
My heart sinks into the pit of my stomach.
It's no use. Mink knew all along.
He knew exactly what I was thinking and what I was going to do.
...I can't win.
...I can't even put up a fight.
Mink strolls up to me at his usual pace and grabs me by the bangs.
The pain forces a groan from my lips.
He pulls my head up, forcing me to meet his eyes.
His stare is hard as steel.

name: ミンク
message: "Idiot. You couldn't be more predictable if you tried."
Mink tugs on my hair again, pulling my face closer. His icy glare pierces my soul.

name: ミンク
message: "I'm never letting you go."

...What was that?
It felt like a jolt of electricity running through my body.
It wasn't fear. It wasn't cold. It was something...
Something that came from much deeper within.

name: ミンク
message: "I guess I'll just have to teach you a lesson."
He lets go of my hair and grabs my arm instead.
I feel my whole body go numb.
